JobFullDesc: We’re looking for an experienced Global Talent Selection Partner to join our people analytics function. Our team uncovers data-driven insights to better attract, develop, motivate, and retain Facebook’s most important asset – our people.  We are looking for a Global Talent Selection Partner who can drive both technical analysis and strategic execution of multiple projects aimed at designing, developing, and  implementing structured, scalable, candidate centric and bias-mitigating selection and assessment solutions to ensure that Facebook is finding and hiring the world's best talent. In partnership with key global stakeholders within People Analytics, across Recruiting, HR, and the business units, this role will support the implementation efforts of the Global Talent Selection (GTS) Team by conducting and partnering on job analytic and validation studies, leveraging highly-effective selection process and technology-enabled solutions, driving priorities, and change
